name: Yokrytte
description:
Version 1.0 (2017-03-05)

Features:

  • 24 deceivingly simple looking algorithmic thinking puzzles
  • Minimalistic art style, holding the spotlight for the gameplay
  • 12 alternative color schemes
  • Stress free gameplay, time taken is neither limited or measured
  • Consistent and intuitive interface

Level music is made by Back to Akert.

I welcome your opinions, suggestions and complaints on twitter and tumblr.

WARNING - Requires OpenGL3.3+ support
